definition: to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
to fan/to slap sb on the face

sentences.english: The wings of the sea gull were beating  frantically.
sentences.chinese: 海鷗的翅膀在瘋狂地撲扇着。

sentences.english: The butterflies are flapping wildly. A security guard swoops in.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶撲扇着翅膀四散開來，一個保安衝了進來。

sentences.english: He had a full seidel of beer in his right hand and his empty left sleeve was flapping.
sentences.chinese: 他的右手拿着一整杯啤酒，空蕩蕩的左袖管撲扇着。
